Workspace¶

Workspace Module¶

class riqsolutions.riskiqapi.Workspace(api_token=None, api_key=None, context=None, url_prefix='v0/workspace')¶

Represents a request to the Workspace Management API https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/

** This is an Internal class and not intended to be called by the user **

create_brands(brand=None)¶

Create new inventory brand(s). Can submit single brand or a list of brands https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/post_v0_workspace_brand

Parameters

brand – type str/list, required

create_organizations(organization=None)¶

Create new inventory organization(s). Can submit single organization or a list of organizations https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/post_v0_workspace_organization

Parameters

organization – type str/list, required

create_tags(tag=None, color=None)¶

Create new inventory tag(s). Can submit single tag or a list of tags. Can only submit a single color. https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/post_v0_workspace_tag

Parameters

  • tag – type str, required

  • color – type str, required

delete_brands(brand=None, gi_api=None)¶

Delete inventory brand(s). Can submit single brand/brand_id or a list of brands/brand_ids. https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/delete_v0_workspace_brand

Parameters

brand – type str/list, optional

delete_organizations(organization=None, gi_api=None)¶

Delete inventory organization(s). Can submit single organization/organization_id or a list of organizations/organization_ids. https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/delete_v0_workspace_organization

Parameters

organization – type str/list, optional

delete_tags(tag=None, gi_api=None)¶

Delete inventory tag(s). Can submit single tag/tag_id or a list of tags/tag_ids. https://api.riskiq.net/api/workspace/#!/default/delete_v0_workspace_tag

Parameters

tag – type str/list, optional
